resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81410</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81410</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4244</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Naming Clothes using Lamh signs</string>
            <string language="es">Nombrar prendas de ropa utilizando el lenguaje de signos Lamh</string>
            <string language="ga">Éadaí a ainmniú ag úsáid comharthaí Lámh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Benennen von von Kleidung mit Lamh Zeichen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nommer des vêtements en utilisant des signes de 
Lamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nomeando a roupa usando sinais de Lamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chiamare i vestiti usando i segni di Lamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ονομασία των ενδυμάτων που χρησιμοποιούν τα σημάδια 
Lamh</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Naming clothing items using Lamh signs Oral language is encouraged. Suitable for students with Moderate/Severe Special Needs.</string>
            <string language="es">Se estimula a nombrar prendas de ropa utilizando el lenguaje de signos Lamh. Apropiada para estudiantes con necesidades especiales moderadas/severas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Éadaí a ainmniú ag úsáid comharthaí Lámh, spreagtar teanga bhéil. Feiliúnach do dhaltaí le Riachtanais Speisialta Mheasarthacha/Dona.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kleidung Einzelteile benennend, die Lamh 
Zeichen, wird Mundverwenden, sprache angeregt. Verwendbar für 
Kursteilnehmer mit Moderate/Severe speziellen Notwendigkeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nommant des éléments d'habillement utilisant des 
signes de Lamh le langage oral est encouragé. Approprié aux 
étudiants avec les besoins spéciaux de Moderate/Severe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nomeando os artigos da roupa que usam sinais de 
Lamh a língua oral é incentivada. Apropriado para estudantes 
com necessidades especiais de Moderate/Severe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chiamando gli articoli dei vestiti che usando i 
segni di Lamh la lingua orale è consigliata a. Adatto ad 
allievi con i bisogni speciali di Moderate/Severe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ονομάζοντας τα αντικείμενα ιματισμού που χρησιμοποιούν
τα σημάδια Lamh η προφορική γλώσσα ενθαρρύνεται. 
Κατάλληλος για τους σπουδαστές με τις μέτριες/αυστηρές 
ειδικές ανάγκες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
